title: Molecular insight into oil displacement by CO2 flooding in water-cut dead-end nanopores
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,25385-25392
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04962D, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Pengfei Lu, Zichen Yan, Jiawen Lai, Keke Wang
The oil recovery-time relationship can be quantified by a compressed exponential function, despite the water-blocking stage. The oil displacement process in water-cut nanopores can be segmented into four distinct stages.
